title: Sterling Generators collaborates with Pi Green for emission control device - Your Gateway to Power Transmission ... - T&D India
summary: Sterling Generators Pvt Ltd (SGPL) and Pi Green Innovations have collaborated to launch a new product called the Retrofit Emission Control Device (RECD). RECD is a green innovation that captures particulate matter from engine exhaust and can be reused as a high-value raw material. The RECD is a business innovation because it is a new and improved product that differs significantly from the firm's previous products.
green_innovation: TRUE. The RECD is an innovation that contributes to environmental sustainability goals by reducing particulate matter from engine exhaust and reusing the captured particulate matter as a high-value raw material.
business_innovation: TRUE. The RECD is a new and improved product that differs significantly from the firm's previous products.
green_product: TRUE. The RECD is a green product because it is designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces its environmental impact throughout its life cycle. The RECD captures particulate matter from engine exhaust and reuses the captured particulate matter as a high-value raw material.
green_process: FALSE. The article does not describe a process. It describes a product.

greenwashing: FALSE. The RECD is not an example of greenwashing because it is a genuine green innovation that reduces particulate matter from engine exhaust and reuses the captured particulate matter as a high-value raw material.

title: BMW Debuts More Powerful and Lighter F900GS For 2024 - ADV Pulse
summary: BMW has unveiled updated mid-range adventure bikes for 2024: the F900GS, F900GS Adventure, and F800GS. The F900GS and F900GS Adventure feature more powerful 895 cc engines, significant weight reductions, and enhanced off-road capabilities. The F800GS gets an upgraded TFT display and LED headlight.
green_innovation: TRUE. The new F900GS and F900GS Adventure feature more powerful and fuel-efficient engines, as well as a number of weight-saving measures and reduced emissions, which contribute to environmental sustainability.
business_innovation: TRUE. The new F900GS, F900GS Adventure, and F800GS all feature new or improved product and business processes, such as more powerful and fuel-efficient engines, enhanced off-road capabilities, and upgraded TFT displays. These innovations are likely to improve the performance, efficiency, and appeal of the motorcycles to consumers.
green_product: TRUE. The new F900GS and F900GS Adventure are more fuel-efficient and have reduced emissions compared to the previous models. This makes them more environmentally friendly and sustainable.
green_process: FALSE. The article does not describe any new or improved processes that meet the criteria to be a green process.

title: Anand Group and Korea’s HL Group ink aftermarket JV, target rapid domestic and global growth - Autocar Professional
summary: Anand Group, a leading manufacturer of auto systems and components, has signed a joint venture (JV) with Korea’s HL Group. The two companies will establish a new company called ‘HL Anand Automotive Parts Pvt Ltd’ that will focus on the aftermarket business for passenger vehicles in domestic and international markets. The new company will offer a wide range of aftermarket components and plans to add around 1,200 new SKUs in the next two years.
green_innovation: TRUE, the joint venture will focus on aftermarket products that are manufactured sustainably and designed to reduce environmental impact.
business_innovation: TRUE, the joint venture is a new business that will offer a new range of aftermarket products and services to the passenger vehicle segment.
green_product: FALSE, the article does not describe any specific green products.
green_process: FALSE, the article does not describe any specific green processes.

title: Pratik Agarwal, Managing Director, Sterlite Power - Your Gateway to Power Transmission & Distribution - T&D India
summary: Sterlite Power is a leading provider of power transmission solutions in India and Brazil. The company is seeing strong demand for its products and services due to the increasing focus on decarbonization and the growing demand for data. The company has recently won a number of large orders for power transmission projects in India and Brazil. Sterlite Power is well-positioned to capture a significant share of the growing market for power transmission solutions.
